name: Forest Tree Invitation
description:
A simple, yet elegant wedding invitation with a classic tree background. Available in 4 different color options or a custom color for an additional fee.

Minimum of 25.

Included:
• 5x7" card digitally flat printed on 110# cardstock
• Corresponding white mailing envelope
• Design and fonts can not be changed but will be typeset and customized by a designer to fit with your information.
• Check out our Add-on Category for additional printing and envelope options as well as our main categories for coordinating products for this design.

Our Order Process:
1. Choose your color option and add to your cart. 
2. Add quantity on the checkout screen and place your order. Paypal, Debit or Credit Cards are accepted at checkout. You do not need a PayPal account to complete your order.
3. Once you place your order, we will send you an e-mail requesting your text information and any other customization requests.
4. A digital proof will be e-mailed to you for approval within 2-3 business days.
5. Once you receive your proofs make any necessary changes or additions. Please be aware that you are responsible for all spelling, grammer, punctuation and dates
6. After we receive an email approval your order will be shipped to you in approximately 7 business days. Rush orders are available.

Thank you!
